Top 10 of adm_2 by best for 2018

bites.bite: The largest adm_1 is South Darfur State with 26 reports followed by Central Darfur state with 25 reports.
The largest adm_2 is East Jebel Marra district with 19 reports followed by with 15 reports.
The largest adm_1 is with 257 reports followed by Northern Darfur state with 247 reports.
The largest adm_2 is with 1344 reports followed by Rokoro district with 112 reports.
